snippet: Buffalo Coach Doug Marrone announced that the rookie E. J. Manuel had fully recovered from a left knee injury and would start against New England on Sunday.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Buffalo Bills announce rookie quarterback E J Manuel has fully recovered from left knee injury and will start in upcoming game against New England Patriots; other football developments noted.
lead_paragraph: Buffalo Coach Doug Marrone announced that the rookie E. J. Manuel had fully recovered from a left knee injury and would start against New England on Sunday.

headline.main: First-Round Pick to Start at Quarterback for the Bills
headline.print_headline: First-Round Pick to Start At Quarterback for the Bills
